snippet: A speaker mentioned the years-old sexual-abuse allegations that rocked the elite Bronx school in the last week, but said the institution would continue to flourish.
abstract: Steven M Friedman, chairman of the board of trustees for the Horace Mann School, tells students gathered for the 2012 graduation ceremony that the elite Bronx institution will continue to flourish despite years-old sexual abuse allegations that have rocked the school.
lead_paragraph: A speaker mentioned the years-old sexual-abuse allegations that rocked the elite Bronx school in the last week, but said the institution would continue to flourish.

headline.seo: At Horace Mann Graduation, Brief Mention of Sexual Abuse Scandal
